The film industry academy is a premier online education company dedicated to helping actors and writers succeed in Hollywood (8). The awards were held on February 12, 2017 (3).

Timeline.Text: Two films, Hacksaw Ridge and Silence, are nominated for the British Academy Film Award.
The British Film Institute digitizes their collection of erotic cinema, including the oldest known erotic film from the Victorian era.
La La Land wins five BAFTA awards, including Best Film.
Many Berklee alumni worked on music and sound for Oscar-nominated films, including those nominated for Best Picture.
The New York Film Academy opens a new campus in Southport.
The online education company Film Industry Academy aims to help actors and writers succeed in Hollywood.
Bette Davis is said to have been devastated by her 1963 Oscar loss.
The film Vampire Academy is released, but due to financial failure, the sequel is not made.
La La Land leads the race for the British Academy Film Award.
The Accolade Global Film Competition announces its latest winners.

Overview.Summary: The 70th British Academy Film Awards took place in London (4,8). The ceremony featured Hollywood royalty, as well as British royalty, with the attendance of the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge (4). The event is known for awarding the best films and TV shows, with the winners including "La La Land" (8), "Silence" (3), and "Glücklich" (7). The awards also recognized the achievements of NASA physicist Katherine Johnson (5). The event has been taking place since 1949 (8) and has become a staple in the British film industry (9).

Overview.Summary: The 70th British Academy Film Awards (BAFTA) were held on February 12, 2017 at the Royal Albert Hall in London (9). The film La La Land led the race for awards (2). Bette Davis was devastated by her loss at the 1963 Oscars, which was compared to the unprecedented screw-up at the BAFTAs (1). The event also featured a 360 red carpet experience (4). Emma Stone wore Chanel to the BAFTA nominees party (5). The film The Dirty Picture received 50 awards and helped push women-centric films (8). Steven Spielberg, who was 70 at the time, was also honored at the event (10).

Overview.Summary: The 70th British Academy Film Awards, also known as the EE British Academy Film Awards, were held on February 12, 2017 at the Royal Albert Hall in London (5,6,7). The ceremony was hosted by Stephen Fry and broadcast on BBC One (5,7,8). The winners were announced, including The Jungle Book for Best Special Visual Effects (3). The event is considered a precursor to the Oscars (2).

Felicity Jones attends the 70th Annual EE British Academy Film Awards.

Overview.Summary: The 70th British Academy Film Awards, also known as the BAFTAs, took place on February 12th, 2017 (7). The awards were held at London's Royal Albert Hall (7). The critically-acclaimed musical La La Land won five awards (7,8). However, there was an unexpected upset when the Best Actor award went to British actor Robert Donat instead of Clark Gable (1). This was also the first year that Amazon Studios received a Best Picture nomination for their film "Manchester by the Sea" (10).

Timeline.Text: The Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences announces changes to the Oscar nominations announcement.
The 70th annual British Academy Film Awards are held, with Stephen Fry as the host.
The Hollywood Reporter publishes predictions for the Academy Awards, with Stephen Fry as the host.
Warren Beatty and Buck Henry, both first-time directors, are nominated for the film adaptation of Harry Segall's stage play Heaven Can Wait.
The 89th annual Academy Awards are held, with Stephen Fry as the host.
Suicide Squad wins an Academy Award for Best Makeup and Hairstyling.
The Forgotten Man Who Stole Clark Gable's Oscar is published, discussing Robert Donat's Best Actor win at the 1939 Academy Awards.
The Jungle Book wins the Academy Award for Best Visual Effects.

Overview.Summary: The 70th British Academy Film Awards were held on February 12, 2017 (1,5,12,13,18). The awards were broadcast on Zee Studio and HD (1). The awards were known for their upsets, including Bette Davis losing to a British actor (2,3). Many Hollywood stars attended the awards, including Penelope Cruz, Taraji P. Henson, and Octavia Spencer (12,17). The awards were dominated by the film "La La Land" which won five awards (18).

Timeline.Text: Zee Studio premieres the 70th British Academy Film Awards, hosted by Penelope Cruz.
Kate Middleton stuns in Alexander McQueen at the BAFTAs.
Ryan Murphy discusses the 1963 Oscar upset and compares it to the 2017 Academy Awards.
Janelle Monae, Taraji P. Henson, and Octavia Spencer honor NASA physicist Katherine Johnson at the 89th Oscars.
Titanic is named one of the top 10 movies that were shot in Mexico.
The difference between the Adapted and Original Screenplay categories at the Oscars is explained.
27 of the best films and TV shows are filmed in Bristol, including several episodes of the British Academy Film Awards.
